錔錔錔
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

錔字的基本解释

錔
tà
金属套：“有大虾蟆如叠，挟二笔錔。”
套；裹。

錔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》他合切，入合，透。］
(1)套；裹。
(2)指套子。

錔字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錔； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1310第05
【唐韻】他荅切【韻會】托合切，?音榻。【說文】以金有所冒也。【玉篇】器物錔頭也。【史記·魯周公世家】郈氏金距。【註】以金錔距。

錔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
錔字的起名意思

暂无。

Chi
Basic explanation of words
Chi
tà
Metal cover: "There are big prawns like stacks, with two pens."
Set; wrap.
Chi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" he is close, close and thorough. ]
(1) Set; wrap.
(2) Refers to sleeves.
Chi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　錔; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1310 05
[Tang Yun] He 荅切 [rhyme will] hold together and cut, and the sound couch. [Said the text] There is also a risk with gold. [Jade articles] The utensils are also chitou. 【Historical Records · Family of Lu Zhougong】Golden distance from Yun's family. [Note] It is based on the gold chisel distance.

Chi
Name meaning
Nothing.
tà
I сущ.
набалдашник, наконечник
II гл.
подковать, оковать
錔钜(距) надеть металлические шпоры (боевомупетуху)
